updated_cases.title: Cancel button clicked by the user
updated_cases.custom_summary: Cancel button clicked by the user
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
1. stack should be up and running
2. client should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Steps:
1. create block policy for upload of google gmail app
2. select default/custom tempalte(select test box in UJ notification template) in policy
3. login to gmail app
4. perform upload activity
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1.User justification page should popup and file should not get uploaded after clicking on cancel button 
2.Proper Cancel events should be generated in Skope IT 
3.Activity should be Upload
 4.Justification reason and justification type should be as empty string even you typed justification string or not in cancel event.
5.Cancel Event should contain policyname and referer name.

updated_cases.title: Pop-up time out
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
1. stack should be up and running
2. client should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Steps:
1. create block policy for upload of google gmail app
2. select default/custom tempalte(select test box in UJ notification template) in policy
3. login to gmail app
4. perform upload activity
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1.User justification page should popup and file should not get uploaded popup timeout reached
2. popup should be disappear after timeout(default timeout is 60 sec)
3. there should not be any event in skopeIT

updated_cases.title: display policy name in UJ event
updated_cases.custom_summary: display policy name in UJ event
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
1. stack should be up and running
2. client should be in altos mode 
and it should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Steps:
1. enabled url filtering for the tenant
2. create user alert policy for cloud stroage category
3. select default/custom tempalte in policy
4. access to app.box.com url

updated_cases.title: display referer name in UJ event
updated_cases.custom_summary: display referer name in UJ event
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
1. stack should be up and running
2. client should be in altos mode 
and it is up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Steps:
1. enabled url filtering for the tenant
2. create user alert policy for cloud stroage category
3. select default/custom tempalte in policy
4. access to app.box.com url
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1.User justification page should popup and file should get uploaded after clicking on proceed 
2.Proper UJ events should be generated in Skope IT 
3.Activity should be Upload
 4.Justification reason and justification type should be seen in UJ event.
5.UJ Event should contain policyname and referer name.
6. traffic type shoud be Web

updated_cases.title: check crashes in proxy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Steps:
1. create user alert policy for upload of google gmail app
2. select default/custom tempalte in policy
3. login to gmail app
4. perform upload activity
5. go to /var/crash folder in proxy05 machine
updated_cases.custom_expected: crashes should not be seen during UJ testing.

updated_cases.title: Validate block button by searching games in google.com
updated_cases.custom_summary: (ENG-237834) Validate proceed button by searching games in google.com with proceed action
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create policy with category "Games" in RTP.
2. Open firefox browser and search google.com
3. Search for poki.com in google search bar.
4. Click on https://poki.com.
5. Click on proceed button.
6. Make sure poke.com is loaded.

updated_cases.title: Validate page is getting loaded properly when tried to access along with TSS scan policy
updated_cases.custom_summary: (ENG-486959) Validate page is getting loaded properly when tried to access along with TSS scan policy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Configure 2 policies: first  - tss v3 scan policy for all categories; upload and download; second - social browse useralert

2. configure browser notification method

3. Verify that messenger.com is loading properly after clicking on user alert proceed button. There should be no webpage load issue. 

4. Test and verify other social media websites - facebook, instagram, twitter, reddit, meetup, snapchat, threads etc.
